description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Fred Welsh [between ca. 1910 and ca. 1915] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title from unverified data provided by the Bain News Service on the negatives or caption cards. Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.17115 Call Number: LC-B2- 3215-15

note._content: "Geo. Borgfeldt & Co." -- Famous importers and distributors of dolls and toys. In business in New York City from 1881 to 1962.
note.author: 70251312@N00

note._content: The structure in the background is the Borgfeldt Building, at West Fourth, Third, and Wooster Streets, in New York City.
note.author: 70251312@N00
